details_header.description: Header for the item details section

details_field.description: Label for a single field in the item details

details_fields.description: Label for multiple fields in the item details

details_password_overlay.message: This password is only available in your Vault.
details_password_overlay.description: Message indicating that the password is stored only in the user's Vault

details_password_decrypt_error.message: Decrypting password error. Please reconnect with your mobile app.
details_password_decrypt_error.description: Error message displayed when decrypting the password fails

details_password_description.message:
This password is only available in your Vault. 
Enter a new one here to update it.
details_password_description.description: Explains that the password is stored in the Vault and can be updated here

details_delete_header.description: Header for the delete login confirmation section

details_delete.message: Delete this Item from your Vault
details_delete.description: Button label to delete the item from the Vault

details_name_required.description: Validation message indicating that the name field is required

details_name_max_length.message: Name must be less than 256 characters.
details_name_max_length.description: Validation message indicating the maximum length for the name field

details_username_max_length.message: Username must be less than 256 characters.
details_username_max_length.description: Validation message indicating the maximum length for the username field

details_uri_max_length.message: URL must be less than 2048 characters.
details_uri_max_length.description: Validation message indicating the maximum length for the URL field

details_service_not_found.message: Something went wrong. Service not found. Lock the Browser Extension and reconnect.
details_service_not_found.description: Error shown when the requested service is not found, suggesting reconnection

details_security_type.description: Label for the security type field in the item details

details_add_domain.description: Button label to add a new domain to the login item

details_add_another_domain.description: Button label to add another domain when at least one exists

details_domain_uri.description: Header label for domain section with URI number

details_no_domain_available.description: Text shown when no domain is assigned to the item

details_name_copied.description: Success message shown when the name is copied to clipboard
